hero.description: Whether you're picking up the violin for the first time or preparing for conservatory auditions, I offer tailored instruction to help you reach your musical goals.

features.description: One-on-one instruction in San Luis Obispo. Personalized attention in a focused learning environment.

features.title: Online Lessons
features.description: Learn from anywhere with high-quality video lessons. Flexible scheduling for busy lifestyles.

features.title: All Skill Levels

philosophy.title: Teaching Philosophy
philosophy.description: I believe in building a strong technical foundation while keeping the joy of music-making at the center of every lesson. My approach combines classical technique with practical musicianship, helping students develop not just as players, but as complete musicians.
